xxl.core.collections.queues.io
Class CounterRandomAccessFileQueue

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.collections.queues.AbstractQueue<E>
      xxl.core.collections.queues.io.StreamQueue<E>
          xxl.core.collections.queues.io.RandomAccessFileQueue
              xxl.core.collections.queues.io.CounterRandomAccessFileQueue
All Implemented Interfaces:
FIFOQueue, Queue
public class CounterRandomAccessFileQueue
extends RandomAccessFileQueue

This class provides a decorator for a random access file queue that counts the number of bytes that are read from and written to the underlying queue.

See Also:
Queue, RandomAccessFileQueue

Constructor Detail

CounterRandomAccessFileQueue

public CounterRandomAccessFileQueue(String filename,
                                    Converter converter,
                                    Function inputBufferSize,
                                    Function outputBufferSize)
Creates a new counter random access file queue that counts the number of bytes read from and written to the specified random access file queue.

Parameters:
filename - the file that is internally used for storing the elements of the queue.
converter - a converter that is used for serializing and de-serializing the elements of the queue
inputBufferSize - a function that determines the size of the input buffer.
outputBufferSize - a function that determines the size of the output buffer.
Method Detail

getReadCount

public long getReadCount()
Returns the number of bytes that are read from the underlying random access file queue.

Returns:
the number of bytes that are read from the underlying random access file queue.

resetReadCount

public void resetReadCount()
Resets the counter for read bytes to 0.

getWriteCount

public long getWriteCount()
Returns the number of bytes that are written to the underlying random access file queue.

Returns:
the number of bytes that are written to the underlying random access file queue.

resetWriteCount

public void resetWriteCount()
Resets the counter for written bytes to 0.
